channel.title: Cellular automata as CNNs on Hugo Cisneros
channel.description: Recent content in Cellular automata as CNNs on Hugo Cisneros

item.title: Notes on: Cellular automata as convolutional neural networks by Gilpin, W. (2018)
item.description: tags Cellular automata as CNNs source (Gilpin 2018) Summary This is one of the only attempt to represent a CA rule as a CNN I have come across. The author uses a deep CNN to learn a rule and studies various information-theoretic quantities in the activation patterns to evaluate the complexity of the rules. Comments I am personally very interested by the paper since it is an interesting direction for creating neural-network based rules that can be sampled and efficiently stored and applied.
